TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit WebPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 指定存取網際網路資源的使用權限。

span.span: Specifies permission to access Internet resources.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您以宣告方式指定的 URI 字串和規則運算式字串可以使用您的類別。 allows you to declaratively specify which URI strings and regular expression strings your class can use. 指定的安全性資訊屬性目標的類別的中繼資料內儲存套用。The security information specified in the is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 系統會存取這項資訊在執行階段。The system accesses this information at run time. 傳遞至建構函式決定允許目標。The passed to the constructor determines the allowable targets. 系統會使用傳回方法，將儲存在中繼資料的可序列化形式，轉換的屬性目標的安全性資訊。The system uses the returned by the method to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata. > [!NOTE] > 只適用於[宣告式安全性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8)。 is used only for [Declarative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8). 如[命令式安全性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27)，使用對應。For [Imperative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27), use the corresponding . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用方法。The following example demonstrates how to apply to a method. [!code-cpp[WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect/CPP/webpermissionattribute_acceptconnect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect/CS/webpermissionattribute_acceptconnect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect/VB/webpermissionattribute_acceptconnect.vb#1)]

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 以指定可以在這個類別上執行的安全性動作的值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a value that specifies the security actions that can be performed on this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞給這個建構函式的值會指定可以執行於此類別的可允許的安全性動作。The value passed to this constructor specifies the allowable security actions that can be performed on this class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用方法。The following example demonstrates how to apply to a method. [!code-cpp[WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is not a valid value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Accept { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前 可接受的 URI 字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI string accepted by the current .

value.span: 字串，包含目前 可接受的 URI。

span.span: A string containing the URI accepted by the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當套用至類別，這個屬性會指定目標 URI 的字串將會接受您的類別內使用。When applying to your class, this property specifies what URI string will be accepted for use within your class. 安全性系統會呼叫時套用此權限。This permission is applied when the security system calls . 這個屬性是寫入-之後。This property is write-once. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來指定允許字串。The following example demonstrates how to use to specify an allowable string. [!code-cpp[WebPermissionAttribute_Accept#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Accept/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermissionAttribute_Accept#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Accept/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermissionAttribute_Accept#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Accept/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 當您嘗試設定此值時， 不是 。

span.span: is not when you attempt to set the value.

exception.span: 如果您想指定一個以上的可接受 URI，請使用額外的屬性宣告陳述式。

span.span: If you wish to specify more than one Accept URI, use an additional attribute declaration statement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

summary.span: 建立並傳回 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.
A corresponding to the security declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由安全性系統，不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫方法。The method is called by the security system, not by application code. 所描述的安全性資訊屬性目標的類別的中繼資料內儲存套用。The security information described by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 系統會存取執行階段資訊。The system accesses the information at run time. 系統會使用傳回来轉換之屬性目標的安全性資訊儲存在中繼資料的可序列化表單。The system uses the returned by to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata.
